comments:
Build id: 200401130800 (Some Integration build of M6)

I experienced a steady stream of Errors resulting from an NPE in StyledText 
when I enabled line numbers in the Java Editor. These errors were reproducible 
by opening a few files, then closing them rapidly via the X at the top of the 
editor. Once the first error occurred, Eclipse was unable to recover and I was 
forced to End Task it. Here are two of the stack traces found in my .log file. 
Note, the NPE in getSelectionRange() was thrown much more often.
